definition: can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

sentences.english: Make a self-development plan to acquire the skills and experiences you need.
sentences.chinese: 制定一个获取技能和经验的自我提升计划。

sentences.english: Accounting major cultivates applied talents with high comprehensive quality, strong professional skills.
sentences.chinese: 会计专业培养综合素质高，专业技能强的应用型人才。

sentences.english: He outshone his fellow pupils in every skill.
sentences.chinese: 他在各种技能上都比他的同学更出色。

sentences.english: A few abilities have had the duration of the secondary effects extended, such as Dragon's Talon.
sentences.chinese: 一些技能的附加效果持续时间被延长，如巨龙钩爪。

sentences.english: It would also give Druids more crowd control power than they are intended to have.
sentences.chinese: 这也会给德鲁依带来比设想中强的群体控制技能。

sentences.english: The key account manager must possess significant skill to run a multi-million dollar business.
sentences.chinese: 大客户经理须具备经营数百万美元生意的重要技能。

sentences.english: In my dream last night, I learned a new skill.
sentences.chinese: 在我昨晚的梦中，我又学到了一项新技能。

sentences.english: Documenting and defending these decisions depends on the communication skills discussed below.
sentences.chinese: 证明和维护这些决策依赖于下面讨论的交流技能。

sentences.english: These superhuman skills had at times been rewarded or punished by Chinese dynasties.
sentences.chinese: 这些超人的技能在中国的不同朝代曾被褒奖或贬抑。

sentences.english: To organize the new Employee's training&assement for quality skill related.
sentences.chinese: 协调有关新员工质量基本技能的培训和评价。

sentences.english: It is more important than appearance, giftedness, or skill.
sentences.chinese: 它也比外表，天赋或技能更重要。

sentences.english: To enhance the development of vocational education service support, training of technical personnel.
sentences.chinese: 要增强职业教育服务发展支撑力，培养技术技能人才。

sentences.english: The students wish to increase their language skills through intensive reading.
sentences.chinese: 学生们希望通过精读提高他们的语言技能。

sentences.english: The embossment requires at least 500 skill in Leatherworking to remain active.
sentences.chinese: 雕饰需要至少500点制皮技能才能生效。

sentences.english: However, among the five skills, translation is a most complex yet high-valued one.
sentences.chinese: 而在这五种能力中，翻译是最难也是最高层次的技能。

sentences.english: The old gardener has green fingers.

definition: Sun Bin (-316 BC), political strategist of the School of Diplomacy 縱橫家|纵横家[Zong4 heng2 jia1] during the Warring States Period (425-221 BC)
Lu Ban, legendary master craftsman, called the father of Chinese carpentry

Diaochan (-192), one of the four legendary beauties 四大美女[si4 da4 mei3 nu:3], in fiction a famous beauty at the break-up of Han dynasty, given as concubine to usurping warlord Dong Zhuo 董卓[Dong3 Zhuo2] to ensure his overthrow by fighting hero Lü Bu 呂布|吕布[Lu:3 Bu4]
Houyi, mythological Chinese archer whose wife was Chang'e
秦越人[Qin2 Yue4 ren2] (407-310 BC), Warring States physician known for his medical skills, nicknamed Bian Que after the earliest known Chinese physician allegedly from the 黃帝|黄帝[Huang2 di4] era
rank/class/(Japanese martial arts and board games) dan
to respond to an assault by killing one's assailant
personal strength/one's special ability or strong points
one who has mastered the sutras (Buddhism)
